channel.title: Irc Chat Room on your forums
channel.description:
If this has been done before please tell me.
I got it to work on invision free
[code]<applet name="applet" codebase="http://www.dynastynet.net/chat/pjirc/" code="IRCApplet.class" archive="irc.jar,pixx.jar" height="400" width="640"> <param name="CABINETS" value="irc.cab,securedirc.cab,pixx.cab"> <param name="nick" value="Java_User"> <param name="name" value="DynastyNet Java Chat"> <param name="host" value="irc.swiftirc.co.uk"> <param name="port" value="6667"> <param name="authorizedcommandlist" value="all-server"> <param name="gui" value="pixx"> <param name="language" value="english"> <param name="quitmessage" value="Bye all"> <param name="alternatenick" value="Java_User"> <param name="autoconnection" value="true"> <param name="command1" value="/join #yourchannelher"> <param name="useidentserver" value="false"> <param name="pixx:timestamp" value="true"> <param name="highlight" value="true"> <param name="pixx:highlightnick" value="true"> </applet> [/code]
[code]<param name="command1" value="/join #yourchannelhere">[/code]
^^^ change this do your channels name
When someone connects through the site they will automatically be called Java_User, do not change the name in the above code or else it will not work properly. just get the user to type /nick yournamehere and they will be changed. only one person may have the name java user at a time so its recommended that you tell them to change their name as soon as they connect so others may join through the forums.

item.title: Irc Chat Room on your forums
item.dc:creator: @MybJames MybJames
item.description:
@MybJames wrote:

kloplop321:

I mean like a dedicated IRC where it is only us and nobody else.

Buy one then. They aren’t free.

Read full topic
item.source: Irc Chat Room on your forums

item.title: Irc Chat Room on your forums
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

kloplop321:

I really do no see the purpose of quoting quotes, I am asking where do I get a free channel!

/mode +i #channelhere

That will make it invite only.

Read full topic

/join #YourChannel

And then register it.

item.title: Irc Chat Room on your forums
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

[quote=“ikick221, post:16, topic:89482”]Anyone have a good irc chat room script i can put on my website?[/quote][quote=“Nwfd1025, post:1, topic:89482”]If this has been done before please tell me.

I got it to work on invision free

[code]

[/code] 
<param name="command1" value="/join #yourchannelhere">

^^^ change this do your channels name

When someone connects through the site they will automatically be called Java_User, do not change the name in the above code or else it will not work properly. just get the user to type /nick yournamehere
and they will be changed. only one person may have the name java user at a time so its recommended that you tell them to change their name as soon as they connect so others may join through the forums.[/quote]

Read full topic
